A plain and easie rule to rigge any ship by the length of his masts, and yards, without any further trouble Bond, Henry.
8 p.
Printed for William Fisher ..., London : 1664.
Title page cropped; title taken from caption title. Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Henry Bond. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
